mapper.select: select bs1.blog_subject_id ,bs1.subject_name ,bs1.create_date,bs1.synopsis ,a1.author_id ,a1.username ,a1.nickname ,b1.blog_id ,b1.title ,b1.create_date from dts_blog_subject bs1 inner join uts_author a1 on a1.author_id = bs1.author_id and bs1.blog_subject_id = #{blogSubjectId} inner join dts_blog_subject_relation bsr1 on bsr1.blog_subject_id = bs1.blog_subject_id inner join dts_blog b1 on b1.blog_id = bsr1.blog_id
select * from dts_blog_subject bs1 inner join uts_author a1 on a1.author_id = bs1.author_id
select bs1.subject_name from dts_blog_subject bs1 left join uts_author a1 on bs1.author_id = a1.author_id where a1.subject_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
